question: Malik Mohammad Jaysi completed his Padmavat during the reign of which of the following?
explanation: Sher Shah Suri of the Sur dynasty patronised learned men. Malik Mohammad Jaysi completed his Padmavat during the regin of Sher Shah Suri only. Also the famous historian named Abbas Khan Sarwani, wrote the Tarikh-i- Shershahi during his reign.
